summary: This is an email chain regarding non-functioning recording capabilities of cameras in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at a correctional facility. The email is forwarded to an acting facility manager and former communications technician for attention.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.role: Acting Facility Manager and Former Communications Technician
persons.context: The email is forwarded to this individual, who is identified as the acting facility manager and a former communications technician, to address the camera issue.

events.title: Email Regarding SHU Camera Malfunction
events.description: An email is sent noting that cameras in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) are functioning but not recording, and the issue is forwarded to the acting facility manager for resolution.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated February 21, 2019, concerning operational issues within a correctional facility.
It specifically notes that cameras in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) are functioning visually but are not recording.
The email is forwarded to an acting facility manager who is also a former communications technician to address the technical problem.
